Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurrences out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment across all cases
Percentage of variants that include SW-Awaiting AE Assignment immediately after SW-Checklist Completed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Number of times SW-Awaiting AE Assignment is directly followed by SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurrences that eventually lead to SW-EIC Reject
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment compared to the frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where SW-Awaiting AE Assignment appears exactly once per case
Metric: the average of the function base == 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Number of variants in which SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurs before any reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurrences that are not followed by any AE assignment activity within 7 days
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurrences to Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation occurrences
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment events that occur in cases ultimately resulting in acceptance (e.g., followed by RW-EIC Accept or SW-EIC Accept)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment in cases that involve at least one instance of SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants containing SW-Awaiting AE Assignment that proceed to a revision stage (e.g., SW-EIC Major Revision or SW-EIC Minor Revision)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Number of times SW-Awaiting AE Assignment appears without being preceded by SW-Checklist Completed
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' does not occur

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurrences relative to all \awaiting\ state activities (e.g., SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion, SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation, SW-Awaiting EIC Decision)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'
